original: Atthekacco puggalo avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena, no ca kho vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena;
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ a vaṇṇā rahassa avaṇṇam bhāsitā hoti bhūtam taccham kālena no ca kho vaṇṇā rahassa vaṇṇam bhāsitā hoti bhūtam taccham kālena

original: atthekacco puggalo vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena, no ca kho avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena;
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ vaṇṇā rahassa vaṇṇam bhāsitā hoti bhūtam taccham kālena no ca kho avaṇṇā rahassa avaṇṇam bhāsitā hoti bhūtam taccham kālena

original: atthekacco puggalo avaṇṇārahassa ca avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena;
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalo avaṇṇā rahassa ca avaṇṇam bhāsitā hoti bhūtam taccham kālena

original: vaṇṇārahassa ca vaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena, atthekacco puggalo neva
analyzed: vaṇṇā rahassa ca vaṇṇam bhāsitā hoti bhūtam taccham kālena attha ekaccaḥ puggalo na iva

original: avaṇṇārahassa avaṇṇaṁ bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena, no ca vaṇṇārahassa vaṇṇaṁ
analyzed: avaṇṇā rahassa avaṇṇam bhāsitā hoti bhūtam taccham kālena no ca vaṇṇā rahassa vaṇṇa

original: bhāsitā hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ kālena.
analyzed: bhāsitāḥ ha iti bhūtam tat śam kālena

original: Uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvī no puññaphalūpajīvī, puññaphalūpajīvī no uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvī, uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvī ca puññaphalūpajīvī ca, neva uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvī no puññaphalūpajīvī.
analyzed: uṭṭhāna phala upajīvī no puñña phala upajīvī puñña phala upajīvī no uṭṭhāna phala upajīvī uṭṭhāna phala upajīvī ca puñña phala upajīvī ca na iva uṭṭhāna phala upajīvī no puñña phala upajīvī

original: Tamo tamaparāyano, tamo jotiparāyano, joti tamaparāyano, joti jotiparāyano.
analyzed: tamaḥ tama parāyanaḥ tamaḥ joti parāyanaḥ joti tama parāyanaḥ joti joti parāyanaḥ

original: Oṇatoṇato, oṇatuṇṇato, uṇṇatoṇato, uṇṇatuṇṇato.
analyzed: oṇa toṇataḥ oṇa tuṇṇataḥ uṇṇa toṇataḥ uṇṇa tuṇṇataḥ

original: Cattāro rukkhūpamā puggalā.
analyzed: cattāro rukkha upamā puggalā

original: Rūpappamāṇo, rūpappasanno, ghosappamāṇo, ghosappasanno.
analyzed: rūpa ppamāṇaḥ rūpa ppasannaḥ ghosa ppamāṇaḥ ghosa ppasannaḥ

original: Lūkhappamāṇo, lūkhappasanno, dhammappamāṇo, dhammappasanno.
analyzed: lūkha ppamāṇaḥ lūkha ppasannaḥ dhamma ppamāṇaḥ dhamma ppasannaḥ

original: Atthekacco puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya;
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ atta hitāya paṭipannaḥ hoti no para hitāya

original: atthekacco puggalo parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no attahitāya;
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalo para hitāya paṭipannaḥ hoti no atta hitāya

original: atthekacco puggalo attahitāya ceva paṭipanno hoti parahitāya ca;
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ atta hitāya ca iva paṭipannaḥ hoti para hitāya ca

original: atthekacco puggalo neva attahitāya paṭipanno hoti no parahitāya.
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ na iva atta hitāya paṭipannaḥ hoti no para hitāya

original: Atthekacco puggalo attantapo hoti attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto;
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ attantapaḥ hoti atta paritāpana anuyogam anuyuttaḥ

original: atthekacco puggalo parantapo hoti paraparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto;
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalo parantapaḥ hoti para paritāpana anuyogam anuyuttaḥ

original: atthekacco puggalo attantapo ca hoti attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto, parantapo ca paraparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto;
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ attantapaḥ ca hoti atta paritāpana anuyogam anuyutto parantapaḥ ca para paritāpana anuyogam anuyutto

original: atthekacco puggalo neva attantapo hoti na attaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto, na parantapo na paraparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto.
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ na iva attantapaḥ hoti na atta paritāpana anuyogam anuyuttaḥ na parantapaḥ na para paritāpana anuyogam anuyuttaḥ

original: So anattantapo aparantapo diṭṭheva dhamme nicchāto nibbuto sītībhūto sukhappaṭisaṁvedī brahmabhūtena attanā viharati.
analyzed: so anattantapaḥ aparantapaḥ diṭṭhe iva dhamme nicchātaḥ nibbutaḥ sītībhūto sukha ppaṭisavedī brahma bhūtena attanā viharati

original: Sarāgo, sadoso, samoho, samāno.
analyzed: sa rāgaḥ sa dosaḥ sa mohaḥ samānaḥ

original: Atthekacco puggalo lābhī hoti ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa, na lābhī adhipaññādhammavipassanāya;
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ lābhī hoti ajjhattam cetaḥ samathassa na lābhī adhi paññā dhamma vipassanāya

original: atthekacco puggalo lābhī hoti adhipaññādhammavipassanāya, na lābhī ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa;
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ lābhī hoti adhipaññā dhamma vipassanāya na lābhī ajjhattam cetaḥ samathassa

original: atthekacco puggalo lābhī ceva hoti ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa, lābhī ca adhipaññādhammavipassanāya;
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ lābhī ca iva hoti ajjhattam cetaḥ samathassa lābhī ca adhi paññā dhamma vipassanāya

original: atthekacco puggalo neva lābhī hoti ajjhattaṁ cetosamathassa, na lābhī adhipaññādhammavipassanāya.
analyzed: attha ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ na iva lābhī hoti ajjhattam cetaḥ samathassa na lābhī adhi paññā dhamma vipassanāya

original: Anusotagāmī puggalo, paṭisotagāmī puggalo, ṭhitatto puggalo, tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo.
analyzed: anusota gāmī puggalo paṭisota gāmī puggalo ṭhitatto puggalo tiṇṇo pāraṅgataḥ thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo

original: Appassuto sutena anupapanno, appassuto sutena upapanno, bahussuto sutena anupapanno, bahussuto sutena upapanno.
analyzed: appassutaḥ sutena anupapannaḥ appassutaḥ sutena upapannaḥ bahussutaḥ sutena anupapannaḥ bahussutaḥ sutena upapannaḥ

original: Samaṇamacalo, samaṇapadumo, samaṇapuṇḍarīko, samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo.
analyzed: samaṇa macalaḥ samaṇa padumaḥ samaṇa puṇḍarīkaḥ samaṇesu samaṇa sukhu mālo

original: Catukkaṁ.
analyzed: catukka
